Author: anonanon#1085
Content: Komodo got me thinking with its cool use-btc-security backup dPOW.

Author: anonanon#1085
Content: Could you use bitcoin for 2fa basically? Say agama wallet asked upon wallet creation if the user wanted to link a bitcoin address.

Author: anonanon#1085
Content: Then in the future to spend funds, maybe a 6 digit random number is generated that you must sign with your BTC address you linked at account creation.

Author: anonanon#1085
Content: Well, sign with the private key to the btc address you linked.

Author: anonanon#1085
Content: Boom, you've got 2fa. Right?

Author: jl777c#5810
Content: cant enforce this signing to be done on a different computer, so it will tend to be in the same computer, which means it is 1fa twice

Author: Emil | Altcoin Magazine#8258
Content: @benohanlon so are you rebranding the Komodo name or the marketing plan?

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Content: @Emil | Altcoin Magazine check in #komodo-team there was a discussion about it earlier today

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: @Emil | Altcoin Magazine  https://komodoplatform.com/komodo-platform-ideas-by-nature-rebranding/

Author: Emil | Altcoin Magazine#8258
Content: Well, I read the ann and the article but it's still unclear. It's my impression that it's only a visual rebrand.

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: visual and identity, i.e. how to explain/market Komodo

Author: KomodoWorld#8282
Content: and later also UX for wallet/dex

Author: Cryptoon#3362
Emil | Altcoin Magazine#8258
Content: Awesome. It's just really confusing since the word "brand" refers to the name it self so a rebranding would mean a new name unless it's stated that it will be a visual rebranding only. Just telling you so you can avoid further confusion form other people

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: That's a fair interpretation of the word "brand" but it looks like we will not be changing the name (although this isn't 100% for sure, no major decisions have been made yet)

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: When we say "brand" we do mean things like visual branding (colors, font, logo) but we also mean brand as in how people think about Komodo

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: So perhaps "brand identity" would be a more accurate term

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: We're doing visual rebranding but we'll also be creating new messaging, a new website, and a new UI/UX for an app

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: So a lot of different aspects to the rebrand

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content:
I can't tell you the number of people messaging me asking if KMD is changing is name, or starting a new chain altogether similar to BTCD -> KMD

This needs to be addressed elsewhere besides just here IMO and look into using a different term for "rebrand"

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: That's fair but I think we covered everything in the official announcement. We've given all the info we have at this time

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: We are def not starting a new chain

Author: dan.#2473
Content: Did I read somewhere they did Dash? Were they responsible for the name change to Dash?

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: Not sure where that idea wouldve come from

Author: dan.#2473
Content: Every name change I can think of in Crypto has merited results, just thinking out loud

Author: xRobeSx#5136
Content: I know the chain wouldn't change so that was an easy answer, but seeing that it happened the last time the name was changed its not an unreasonable question/thought.

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: That's valid but we def aren't starting a new chain

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: And while nothing is certain, I think (personal opinion here, not speaking as a team member) its really unlikely that the name will change

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: We tried to put all the info we have at this point in the announcement

Author: Daniel CP#2020
Content: All I can say is that a lot of things have yet to be decided but we are 100% gonna do what is best for Komodo and will always take community feedback into consideration

Author: dan.#2473
Content: imo, if the goal is brand image and awareness, everything has to possibly be on the table
